entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:59 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 01:52 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -19.9°C
Wind: E 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
